page.title: 12CHANGE IN SUTTON ST JAMES
page.content: We organised ourselves into groups of four or five , and agreed on the questions that we would put inthe survey. We decided to ask questions based on any changes that may have happened since the 1939-1945 War. We chose six senior citizens, who were pleased to talk and give information. Not all of these six people have lived in Sutton St. James all their lives, and so we felt them to be fairly representative of the village population. 1){ARE YOU FROM THIS VILLAGE? Four out of six people had been born and bred in the village. The other two came from nearby villages, and had always known Sutton St. James well before they even came here to live, and had a wide knowledge of families in the area.
